channel.title: Max Korzh on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Max Korzh on Rusland 1

item.title: Best from Belarus: music from White Russia
item.description: In the selection of Belarusian music, Би-2, Molchat Doma, and Грязь are absent due to prior coverage. Brutto Also see Родны Край (2015) and Партизан Рок (2015). And check out Железный (2012), Манифест (2008), and Капитал (2007) from Lyapis Trubetskoy (Ляпис Трубецкой), the band Brutto emerged from.
